main

Class SLChat

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.SLChat

  • public class SLChat
extends java.lang.Object
    Main entrance to the whole program.

    This static class Starts the main GUI window and also guides program workflow, serving as intermedium between other objects in program. Contains methods for getting service information (getIP() for example).

    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Andrey Fadeev

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts main GUI window.

        Instantiates new thread of class Startview.

        Parameters:
        args - not useful

      • startClient

        public static void startClient(java.net.InetAddress serverAddress,
                               java.lang.String roomName)
        Starts Client backend class thread.
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - a string with found server's IPv4 address
        roomName - a string with received room name;

      • getIP

        public static void getIP()
        Searches for server's IP on LAN.

        Starts Seeker and then waits for response from server with datagram, from which it retrieves server's address and room name.

      • getIfaceAddress

        public static java.net.InetAddress getIfaceAddress(java.lang.String iName)
                                            throws java.net.SocketException
        Gets interface address, from which to send packets.
        Parameters:
        iName - The name of interface for which to get IP-address
        Returns:
        InetAddress from which to send packets
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - When cannot get address by name

      • getIfaceAddress

        public static java.net.InetAddress getIfaceAddress()
                                            throws java.net.SocketException
        Gets interface address, from which to send packets.

        Invokes method of the same name getIfaceAddress(String), supplying chosen network interface (prefferedInterface) to it.

        Returns:
        InetAddress from which to send packets
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - When cannot get address by name
